scripts.test:next-app: rm -rf next-app-test && npx tsx ../packages/create-template/index.ts -n next-app-test -f next/app && cd next-app-test && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.test:next-pages: rm -rf next-pages-test && npx tsx ../packages/create-template/index.ts -n next-pages-test -f next/pages && cd next-pages-test && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.test:tanstack: rm -rf tanstack-test && npx tsx ../packages/create-template/index.ts -n tanstack-test -f tanstack-router && cd tanstack-test && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test
scripts.test:all: pnpm test:next-app && pnpm test:next-pages && pnpm test:tanstack
